duties_responsibilities.duty: Manage regional projects and innovation initiatives in the telecommunications industry.
Implement, monitor, and control regional and district standards for Network Implementation and Operations (NI&O) teams.
Develop project plans and report performance results in relation to Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) and Objectives and Key Results (OKRs).
Collaborate with district-based teams to deliver corporate objectives, improve processes, and enhance the customer experience.
Maintain open communication across functional teams and work as a unit to support the regional NI&O organization.
Lead implementation and training of systems, tools, processes, and procedures for teams throughout the region.
Develop district OKRs that drive national and regional KPI results.
Monitor performance trends to drive meeting or exceeding targeted results.
Engage regional cross-functional teams and national Business Process Improvement teams for process improvement and OKR/KPI attainment.
Maintain the highest ethical and business standards and conduct with the greatest degree of professional integrity.

education_certification.credential:
Bachelor’s Degree or equivalent experience required
Master of Business Administration preferred
